Intercepted drone commands are encrypted with RSA using special numbers; rumors say the primes are both congruent to 3 mod 4. The message is: 1237292394584610503101983004898947586134851320600745815654052980265669888632077115107926291162694543880303834784038235167252343137273596943832775609339082

The flag format is flag{...}
n=4600865643293506090565962003359049011206597890005535941732276785600884725552665588321575066021198224389706199628899078504364383003411975740568828372202917, e=2836055410944473402371249443804799806061564789626936746911202955501123776698624496047260934538605955692225050425255223725857160460095779251447944711442205
The lower 104 bits of p are: 30813047089117961719662854239760949283


---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{pw950y7m}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 1237292394584610503101983004898947586134851320600745815654052980265669888632077115107926291162694543880303834784038235167252343137273596943832775609339082
vulnerability: blum integers
hint: Blum integers are products of primes congruent to 3 modulo 4. These integers have unique properties in cryptography.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=4600865643293506090565962003359049011206597890005535941732276785600884725552665588321575066021198224389706199628899078504364383003411975740568828372202917, e=2836055410944473402371249443804799806061564789626936746911202955501123776698624496047260934538605955692225050425255223725857160460095779251447944711442205
The lower 104 bits of p are: 30813047089117961719662854239760949283

extra_info: p=58734331707738459297982831174067477283880078424411744082970836487754067222563, q=78333497794567151024791114356276987472758489003670070772396738320685629655959, Ï†(n)=4600865643293506090565962003359049011206597890005535941732276785600884725552528520492072760410875450444175855164142439936936301188556608165760388675324396
